#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int n, k, neg1, negVal, i, j, sum;
	
	scanf("%d %d", &n, &k );
	
	vector<int> A( n );
	
	for( i = 0;i < n;i++ )
		scanf("%d", &A[ i ] );
	
	for( i = 0, negVal = 0;i < n;i++ )
		if( A[ i ] >=0 )
			break;
		else
			negVal++;
	
	neg1 = n - k;

	if( negVal >= neg1 ) 
		for( i = 0, j = neg1;j > 0;i++, j-- )
			A[ i ] *= -1;
		
	else  {		
//		cout << "negVal : " << negVal << ", neg1 : " << neg1 << endl;
		for( i = negVal,j = 1;j <= ( neg1 - negVal );i++, j++ )
			A[ i ] *= -1;
		for( i = negVal - 1;i >= 0;i-- )
			A[ i ] *= -1;	
	}

/*	copy( A.begin(), A.end(), ostream_iterator<int> ( cout, " " ) );
	cout << endl;
*/	
	for( i = 0, sum = 0;i < n;i++ )
		sum += A[ i ];
		
	printf("%d\n", sum );

	return 0;
}
